scripts.dev: truffle compile && truffle migrate --network testrpc && NODE_ENV=development node server.js
scripts.postinstall: cp -f node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css www/css/bootstrap.min.css && cp -f node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js www/js/jquery.min.js && cp -f node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js www/js/bootstrap.min.js && cp -f node_modules/web3/dist/web3.min.js www/js/web3.min.js && cp -f node_modules/truffle-contract/dist/truffle-contract.min.js www/js/truffle-contract.min.js && cp -f node_modules/socket.io-client/dist/socket.io.js www/js/socket.io.js
scripts.testrpc: testrpc --db './build/testrpc/' -m 'ranch predict scissors flock present suffer organ infant dragon sheriff lazy weird'
